channel.title: ES6 on Minko Gechev's blog
channel.description: Recent content in ES6 on Minko Gechev's blog

item.title: Asynchronous calls with ES6 generators
item.description: ES6 generators have landed in Chrome 39 Beta on 9th of October and are already available in the stable version. This means that brand new development practices are already applicable, although for supporting older browsers you might need to fallback to the traceroute compiler. A cool module, which TJ developed, called co, is available for quite a while (his initial commit in the co repository was on 6th of June 2013).
